Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Right bank of rio Negro. ssp. presumed from location. In terra firme forest with open understorey with plenty of thin saplings. One of the birds singing in XC119404. On playback of the previous recording this bird appeared and sang, perched 2-4m above ground. Made darting sallies to capture insects.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
